details.excerpt: This week was a short week (because Easter), but I spent much of my time wrestling with the Google Calendar API, building an [app that will allow our members to see what desks, pods and rooms have been booked](https://github.com/theodi/office-calendar), and eventually be able to book them themselves.
details.content:
This week was a short week (because Easter), but I spent much of my time wrestling with the Google Calendar API, building an app that will allow our members to see what desks, pods and rooms have been booked, and eventually be able to book them themselves.

Sam spent the week getting our Ops ducks in rows, and migrated much of our code to Rackspace.

James wrestled with various annoying problems with external APIs and worked more on our newly launched Member Directory.

Jeni had a meeting with Virgin on how they are going to publish their open data, attended an open contracting workshop with the World Bank and continued work on the Open Data Certificates.

We also played with Gource to generate some cool-looking visualisations of our source code - like this:
